title: Give it All You’ve Got!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Augh~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ai-chan, what happened? Do you have a stomach ache?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>My stomach is fine. But Ai-san is having a crisis~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Huh!? What’s wrong!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>There are so many things I want to do, but I don’t have enough time to do them all! Hey, hey. Ayumu, take a look at this. What should I prioritize?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Wow...... you do have a lot of things you want to do. Develop new running courses, brainstorm concert ideas, hold an Ai Pals fan meeting, put on a punny show, make new costumes, and come up with a new monjayaki menu item.......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ayumu, do you ever get stuck on what you should do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Of course I have. I want to create new costume designs, memorize new dance steps, reply to fan mail, and so on. Ai-chan, I want to work on fitness training for my next concert just like you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I see...... Ai got it. Getting hung up like this is a waste of time. When you’re stuck and can’t decide what to do first on a list, you end up being unable to do anything on the list! Alright, Ayumu! Let’s do some fitness training! Let’s develop new running courses together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Gotcha! Let’s get changed into our training uniforms then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
